mapper.insert: insert into budgets (accountId, categoryId, name, amount, status, date, actualAmount) values (#{accountId}, #{categoryId}, #{name}, #{amount}, #{status}, curdate(), #{actualAmount});
mapper.update: update budgets set categoryId = #{categoryId}, name = #{name}, amount = #{amount}, status = #{status}, actualAmount = #{actualAmount} where id = #{id} and accountId = #{accountId} and month(`date`) = #{month} and year(`date`) = #{year};
mapper.select: select * from budgets where categoryId = #{categoryId} and accountId = #{accountId} and month(`date`) = #{month} and year(`date`) = #{year};
